_meanings:
(In <ab>gram.</ab>) Following,
coming after or upon (as a letter,
accent &c.); {#udayaSabdaH paraSabdasamAnArTaH#}
{#prAtiSAKyezu prasidDaH#},

{@--1@} Rise (fig
also); {#caMdrodaya ivodaDeH#} <ls>R. 12. 36</ls>,  
<ls n="R.">2. 73</ls>; going upwards, ascending (as
of the sun, stars &c.).

{@--4@} The eastern mountain (behind
which the sun is supposed to
rise); {#yEryatra dfSyate BAsvAnsa tezAmudayaH#}
{#smftaH; udayagUQaSaSAMkamarIciBiH#} <ls>V. 3. 6.</ls>

gradual rise; {#nAqInAM#} <ls>Māl. 5. 2</ls> by 
gradually inflating or filling with
wind the Nāḍīs, (as in the act of
restraining the wind).

the
plateau of the mountain behind
which the sun is supposed to rise.
